author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger: Spanish and Portuguese
description: GameChanger wallet focus on developing countries' users, but lacks i18n. We want to break that barrier to onboard, especially, LATAM users.
solution: Integrate commonly used i18n and translations in spanish and portuguese for our main product, GameChanger Wallet.
experience: We made GameChanger, a released and long term product, highly humanized and gamified wallet, committed to newcomers, students and builders.
